content: remove sm p1 place sm p to last st pfb 17 row 11 13 15 17 19 pfb p to sm slip sm p2 cdd p to last st pfb 17 row 12 14 16 18 20 k to 4 sts before sm p3 k1 remove sm k1 place sm k to end of row 17 proceed to section two section two row 21 23 25 27 29 kfb k to sm slip sm k2 cdd k to last st kfb row 22 24 26 28 30 pfb p to sm remove sm p1 place sm p to last st pfb row 31 33 35 37 39 pfb p to sm slip sm p2 cdd p to last st pfb row 32 34 36 38 40 k to 4 sts before sm p3 k1 remove sm k1 place sm k to end of row you now have 27 stitches work row 21 to 40 thirteen times more if you have extra yarn and prefer a longer scarf work more repeats each repeat of row 21 to 40 adds 10 stitches proceed to section three section three cast off very loosely as follows k1 k1 pass first st over second st on right needle repeat to end pull yarn through last stitch block as follows pin top points stretch out length of scarf and pin bottom point spray scarf with water until dampened allow to dry completely ©copyright august 2017 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not share copy photograph or distribute this pattern
